function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality (IAQ)","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised health","Mitigation":"Incorporate energy recovery ventilation (ERV) systems and adjust ventilation rates based on infection probability and exposure time","Technologies":"Energy recovery ventilation systems, mechanical ventilation with heat recovery, ventilation rate control systems","People":"Building occupants, particularly those in close proximity to each other","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation rates for controlling infection probability","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and reduced effectiveness of protective measures (e.g., wearing masks)","Mitigation":"Implement higher ventilation rates based on exposure time and infection probability, considering the use of masks","Technologies":"Ventilation rate control systems, energy recovery ventilation (ERV) technology","People":"Building occupants, particularly those in close proximity to each other","Owner":"Building managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Dependence on mechanical ventilation systems for indoor air quality control","Impact":"Risk of system failure leading to compromised indoor air quality and increased disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of mechanical ventilation systems, backup ventilation systems in case of failure","Technologies":"Energy recovery ventilation (ERV) systems, mechanical ventilation maintenance and monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, building maintenance and HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building managers, building maintenance and HVAC technicians"}]}
